summary: An ordinance accepting an easement for street purposes from the Commissioner of Public Lands of the State of Washington to the City of Seattle, over, across and upon portions of Lots 9, 10, 11, 14, 15 and 16, Block 20, Brooklyn Addition, and of the vacated alley adjacent thereto; confirming that said easement satifies the conditions imposed by Ordinances No. 80686 and No. 80687 for vacating certain streets and alleys, and laying off East 40th Street Grade Separation.
